contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=August 2009}} [[Image:Osaka-subway-Y14-Yotsubashi-station-platform.jpg|thumb|Platform]] {{nihongo|'''Yotsubashi Station'''|四ツ橋駅|Yotsubashi-eki}} is a [[railway station]] on the [[Yotsubashi Line (Osaka)|Osaka Municipal Subway Yotsubashi Line]] in [[Nishi-ku, Osaka|Nishi-ku]], [[Osaka]], [[Japan]]. ==History== *October 1, 1965 - The station opened, because the section of the Yotsubashi Line from Daikokucho to Nishi-Umeda was opened. ==Lines== *Osaka Municipal Subway **Yotsubashi Line (Station number: Y14) Yotsubashi Station is treated as the same station as [[Shinsaibashi Station]] for the purpose of fare calculation. Shinsaibashi Station is served by the following lines: *[[Nagahori Tsurumi-ryokuchi Line]] (N15) *[[Midōsuji Line]] (M19) ==Layout== There is an [[island platform]] with two tracks on the second basement in the west of Shinsaibashi Station on the Nagahori Tsurumi-ryokuchi Line. {{ja-rail-line|first=2|pfn=1|name=Yotsubashi Line|dir=for {{ja-stalink|Namba}}, {{ja-stalink|Daikokucho}} and {{ja-stalink|Suminoekoen}}|col=#0078ba}} {{ja-rail-line|first=3|pfn=2|name=Yotsubashi Line|dir=for {{ja-stalink|Nishi-Umeda}}|col=#0078ba}} ==Surroundings== *[[Amerikamura]] *Crysta Nagahori *Horie *Osaka School of Music *ORIX Theater ==Stations next to Yotsubashi== {{j-railservice start}} {{j-route|route=Osaka Municipal Subway Yotsubashi Line (Y14)|col=#0078ba|f=w}} {{j-rserv|service=-|previous={{ja-stalink|Hommachi}} (Y13)|next={{ja-stalink|Namba}} (Y15)|f=b}} {{end box}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Yotsubashi}} {{coord|34|40|26.75|N|135|29|48.40|E|region:JP_type:railwaystation|display=title}} {{Osaka-railstation-stub}} {{Osaka Municipal Subway Yotsubashi Line}} [[Category:Osaka Municipal Subway stations]]
